Reviews.Title: “Hit the spot!”
Reviews.Author: awhiz
Reviews.Content: stayed property night indiana arrived near midnight front desk smiling waiting upgraded doubles king suite nice layout slept quick enjoyed breakfast hit road 9

Reviews.Title: “Fairfield Needs a Facelift”
Reviews.Author: BlueMarlinDave
Reviews.Content: typical frills fairfield located close indianapolis airport decided stay due flight met service front desk upgraded king suite check hotel dated facelift age wear otherwise cant fault service location

Reviews.Title: “Good night's sleep, good breakfast. Nice staff. Easy access to airport.”
Reviews.Author: NebraskaJack
Reviews.Content: usual fairfield inn marriott brands completely rely shuttle airport convenient clean relatively spacious breakfast decent overall value looking restaurant nearby highly recommend library pork chops memorable australian shiraz hill

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: burkehouse
Reviews.Content: stopped night indiana reservation 6 pm marriott mobile site arrived 9 pm front desk clerk upgraded suite marriott rewards clean except nightstands husband found halfeaten smelly hamburger nightstands looked awhile tired complain left note housekeeping brave husband trash else perfect exactly expect marriott brand hotel night sleep breakfast taking morning stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfortable hotel by the airport”
Reviews.Author: mgottlieb26
Reviews.Content: picked hotel proximity airport free shuttle service pleasantly surprised hotel fancy service front desk staff shuttle driver shuttles run half hour 10 minute drive airport clean comfortable hotel pretty decent shape gym wasnt special machines tiny job free breakfast fine waffles oatmeal bakery items stocked nice hotel price location stay

Reviews.Title: “Good Service, Nice Room”
Reviews.Author: mamabear3124
Reviews.Content: located industrial bit concerned staff nice clean bed comfortable sort sports teams noisy breakfast swamped hot tub looked forward location reccommend property deal money trouble parking handicap 8 12 ice snow extremely dangerous especially people balance

Reviews.Title: “was convenient for the old airport location”
Reviews.Author: djtimmy
Reviews.Content: stayed property couple times time stayed close airport travelling business property fine unable nights sleep due access road run apartment complex runs past hotel hear loud driving night switched hotel remainder stay wont consider property future

Reviews.Title: “Quality Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mikehettmann
Reviews.Content: location immediately 465 bottom exit staff quick checked bringing bags clean dresser clean bed sheets clean bathroom clean checked mattress signs bedbugs clean looked hotel quiet overall heard planes overhead breakfast nice sampling bakery waffles fruit etc internet access didnt hotel workout extremely

Reviews.Title: “older property at airport but clean with quality staff”
Reviews.Author: chamomilegardens
Reviews.Content: admit stayed purchasing discount price paid worth advertised price pay marriott bargain property limited town homes hotel directly parking closed deli looking dine nearby options immediate unimpressive selection waffle house dennys downtown 12minute drive free wifi free parking free breakfast free airport shuttle hotel breakfast appointed healthy cooked oatmeal yogurt waffle maker fresh fruit english muffins toast jimmy dean sandwiches available clean comfortable bed air conditioner odd smell bedspread curtains appeared fresh pool clean signs cosmetic wear staff standard bath towels laid pool swim staff friendly helpful tasting coffee kept fresh fruit welcomed touch eclectic dinner dining distance
